comment: Good flavor but it’s really spicey. I add an ice cube and even then still has a hard bite. Not bad price. Not for me though.
Good classic bourbon. Well rounded and memorable

Store pick: yankee
Nose: vanilla, brown sugar, baked goods, hint of dill, tobacco, cherries 
Palate: thin, red fruit, cinnamon, oak char, pepper 
Finish: wow! this explodes on the finish into a cinnamon barrel spice bomb, very long, oak
